summary: This header file defines platform-specific configurations for DragonFly BSD in the Sendmail project. It sets the OS name and configures various system capabilities including shared memory, semaphores, and message queues for the DragonFly BSD platform.

logs.reason: This string may appear in logs when Sendmail reports which operating system it's running on. It's defined as SM_OS_NAME and would be referenced elsewhere in the code.
logs.resolution: This is an informational value, not an error, so no resolution is required. If it appears in logs, it's correctly identifying DragonFly BSD as the platform.
